<!-- Generated by agents-reverse-engineer -->
# scripts/commands

CLI command handlers for git-flow operations. Each file exports a `printHelp()` function and an async `handle*` function that validates git-flow availability, processes options, and executes `git flow` subcommands.

## Contents

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| [config.js](./config.js) | Manages git-flow config via `--get`, `--set`, `--list` operations |
| [delete.js](./delete.js) | Deletes feature/release/hotfix/support branches with `--force` flag |
| [finish.js](./finish.js) | Completes branch merges with optional tagging, push, and squash |
| [init.js](./init.js) | Initializes git-flow in repository with `--dry-run` support |
| [list.js](./list.js) | Lists branches by type (feature/release/hotfix/support) |
| [publish.js](./publish.js) | Publishes branches to remote with `--dry-run` support |
| [start.js](./start.js) | Creates new branches with base branch resolution and force options |
| [track.js](./track.js) | Creates local tracking branches from remote branches |

## Architecture

Commands follow a consistent validation chain: `ensureGitFlowAvailable({autoInstall: false})` → `ensureGitFlowInitialized()` → operation-specific validation → `runGitFlow()` execution. All commands export dual entry points: `printHelp()` for usage docs and `handleXxx(opts)` for execution.

## Patterns

- **Handler signature**: All async handlers accept `opts` object with `help?`, `dryRun?` flags plus operation-specific options
- **Branch name construction**: `const branchName = \`${type}/${name}\`` (type ∈ {feature, release, hotfix, support})
- **Validation helpers**: `ensureBranchExists()`, `ensureBranchMissing()`, `ensureCleanTree()`, `ensureTagMissing()`
- **Logging**: Uses `logError`, `logInfo`, `logSuccess`, `logWarn` from ../git-flow.js for colored output
- **Exit codes**: Errors exit with code 1, help display exits with code 0

## Import Map

All commands import from `../git-flow.js`:

| Symbol | Used By |
|--------|---------|
| `COLOR_BOLD`, `COLOR_RESET` | All files (help text formatting) |
| `ensureGitFlowAvailable` | All files |
| `ensureGitFlowInitialized` | All except config.js, init.js |
| `runGitFlow` | delete.js, finish.js, init.js, publish.js, start.js, track.js |
| `logError`, `logInfo`, `logSuccess` | All files |
| `ensureBranchExists` | delete.js, finish.js, publish.js, start.js |
| `ensureCleanTree` | finish.js, start.js |
| `runGit` | config.js, delete.js, finish.js |
| `getGitFlowConfig` | config.js |
| `listBranchesByType` | list.js |
